title: The $2 Billion Mall Rats
excerpt: The inside story of a black sheep hedge fund, a massive bet that shopping malls would crash, and how they proved Wall Street wrong.

title: What is a store worth?
excerpt: Retailers who want to measure the full value of their physical stores need to consider factors in addition to in-store sales.

title: Inside the 20-year decline of Toys R Us
excerpt: Cost cuts, stressed employees, intercompany rivalries, dirty floors, dusty rafters, glitchy IT, fudged metrics: The people who ran the failed toy retailer's stores know what went wrong.
